text: hananim-ui gil-eseo jasin-ui jaesan-eul huisahaneun jadeul-ui yeneun ilgob gaeui isag-eul jalanage han nat-algwado gat-euni isag hanamada baeg gaeui nat-al-i issdoda. hananimkkeseoneun wonhasineun jaleul wihae (bosang-eul) bullyeo jusinola. hananimkkeseoneun (eunhyega) deuneolb-eusin bun-imyeo asineun bun-ila
